# ==(_:_:)

**Operator**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two values are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
static func == (lhs: ScaledPose3D, rhs: ScaledPose3D) -> Bool
```

## Comparing values

- **isApproximatelyEqual(to:tolerance:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two scaled poses are equal within a specified tolerance.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two scaled poses are equal within a specified tolerance.
items.name: isApproximatelyEqual(to:tolerance:)
